data.system_settings: iPhone 8 +, iOS 11.1.1 (but seems to occur on other OS’s, so all is free to try it.)
data.actual_result: Server does not display white blocks even when new messages are sent in the now unmuted channel.
data.expected_result: Channel is unmuted and server icon shows a white block next to it when outside of the said server
data.short_description: White Block Next to Server Icon Does Not Show After unMuting via Notification settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a channel muted - Go to Notification Settings  - Scroll down to channel, then click on unmute
